backend/main.mo: Actor handling access control, user approval workflows, and simple user profile storage with permission‑checked CRUD endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard layout changes, related files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across auth, admin, user, state, and utility modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the root element and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component switching between login, admin panel, and user dashboard based on session state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable gradient action tile component with size variants for admin, user, and small layouts.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Generic confirm dialog component built with alert‑dialog primitives and customizable actions.
Sonner-based toast helper providing success, error, and info notifications.
Admin layout shell with header, footer, logout confirmation, and branding elements.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: User dashboard footer with support/chat button styled in green gradient.
Frame wrapper giving dashboards a bordered, rounded container with fixed viewport height.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin view component managing active section, logout dialog, and rendering dashboard or section shells.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for admin views with icons and active-state styling.
Three‑group grid menu of admin shortcuts using ActionTile items to navigate to different views.
Layout wrapper providing a fixed header, scrollable content area, and footer for admin subpages.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines AdminView type and navigation item metadata for admin routing.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Displays dynamic income, expense, and due summary cards loaded from local storage.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Handles pending user approvals, updates approved users and workers, and manages related storage updates.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Form and tables for adding and viewing company financial reports stored by type.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Displays final balance table by loading workers and account totals from storage.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Manages snack expense entries, updates per‑person costs, and maintains nasta history and account deductions.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Handles loan/payment entries, splitting amounts among workers and updating account cost history.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Adds production entries, calculates totals, updates worker bill amounts, and manages production history.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper component rendering system settings UI.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Allows updating branding settings, including company info and logo upload, using tabs UI.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Renders the approvals section for managing user requests.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Manages worker list and rate settings with local storage, allowing add, edit, and delete actions with UI forms and tables.
Records work entries using worker rates, updates individual bills, and maintains work history.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides the login form, validation, branding display, and handles session login flow with error states.
Handles user registration requests, checks duplicates in pending and approved lists, and stores new pending registrations.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Implements a support messaging interface for users and admins, loading threads, displaying messages, and sending replies.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Displays a live-updating digital clock with formatted date and time.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Shows summary cards for total due, total work, and total cost with styled KPI components.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Loads and displays a user's combined payment and nasta history from local storage, filtering by username and showing totals.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Fetches and shows board work production records for the logged‑in user, including totals for bodies and amount.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Formats worker names for display, falling back to 'Unknown worker' when missing.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: Provides UI for updating profile photo, mobile number, and password with dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard that switches between views, loads user account totals, and supports logout and navigation.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Displays the user's work history and computes their individual earnings using work details or rate-based fallback.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Calculates per-user or group totals for work entries using detailed bills when available or stored rate data as fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Handles reactive branding settings by reading storage and listening for update events.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Manages simple hash‑based routing with state updates on hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, theme variables, gradients, and utility classes for consistent UI styling. Adds custom color palette and layout utilities.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages brand settings in localStorage, merging defaults with stored values and emitting update events. Provides access to logo URLs and branding attributes.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Stores and retrieves company report entries in localStorage with CRUD helpers. Supports filtering reports by type.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers around localStorage operations with JSON handling and fallback behavior. Includes helpers for reliably loading arrays and validating structures.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Ensures a consistent storage schema by clearing legacy keys and marking the current version. Runs once to migrate old data formats.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Manages support message threads in localStorage, allowing adding messages and retrieving user-specific threads. Maintains timestamped conversation history.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Stores, retrieves, and removes user profile photos in localStorage using a prefixed key. Handles data URL–based photo storage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Mounts the main App component.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Manages user sessions with admin and user login logic, storage schema initialization, and session persistence via localStorage. Provides profile update and session state through context.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for session data, login results, user profiles, and pending requests. Structures the contract for session-related context operations.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Convenience hook for accessing SessionContext, enforcing provider usage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing UI redesign requirements, shared layout goals, and existing feature specifications.
